EntryName	RU2A_HUMAN
ProteinName	U2 small nuclear ribonucleoprotein A' (U2 snRNP A')
GeneName	SNRPA1
Length	255
Function	Involved in pre-mRNA splicing as component of the spliceosome (PubMed:11991638, PubMed:27035939, PubMed:28076346, PubMed:28502770, PubMed:28781166, PubMed:32494006). Associated with sn-RNP U2, where it contributes to the binding of stem loop IV of U2 snRNA (PubMed:27035939, PubMed:32494006, PubMed:9716128).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
